title: Dow Analyst Moves: AAPL - Nasdaq.com
text: The latest tally of analyst opinions from the major brokerage houses shows that among the 30 stocks making up the Dow Jones Industrial Average, Apple is the #15 analyst pick. Within the broader S&P 500, when components were ranked in terms of analyst favorites, AAPL claims the #202 spot.    makeArticleAd();  Looking at the stock price movement year to date, Apple is showing a gain of 29.8%.        VIDEO: Dow Analyst Moves: AAPL
